reviewtext: I use this cable in conjunction with aBelkin USB 2.0 4-Port Ultra Mini Huband all my USB peripherals work (mouse, self-powered external Seagate hard drive, HP printer) as expected. Of course you can't *power* devices through an extension cable and hub so I don't connect myWestern Digital My Passport Essentialthrough it.Note that the product states that using USB extension cables past a certain length may result is problems using your peripherals that aren't designed to be used with very long cables so you use according to your own risks, but as I said before I haven't had any problems.
